TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PlatformHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Utilities for working with the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool CheckSystemVersion (int major, int minor);
.method public static hidebysig bool CheckSystemVersion(int32 major, int32 minor) cil managed
static member CheckSystemVersion : int * int -> bool

Docs.param: The major version number to check.
The minor version number to check.
Docs.summary: Checks if the version of the system is at least the specified version.
Docs.returns: Returns true if the system version is at least the specified version.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int CompareIosVersion (this ObjCRuntime.Platform a, ObjCRuntime.Platform b);
.method public static hidebysig int32 CompareIosVersion(valuetype ObjCRuntime.Platform a, valuetype ObjCRuntime.Platform b) cil managed
static member CompareIosVersion : ObjCRuntime.Platform * ObjCRuntime.Platform -> int

Docs.param: The first platform value to compare.
The second platform value to compare.
Docs.returns: Returns -1 if the first platform is earlier than the second platform, 0 if the platform versions are identical, and 1 if the first platform is later than the second platform.

MemberSignature.Value: public static ObjCRuntime.Platform GetHostApiPlatform ();
.method public static hidebysig valuetype ObjCRuntime.Platform GetHostApiPlatform() cil managed
static member GetHostApiPlatform : unit -> ObjCRuntime.Platform

Docs.summary: Returns a Platform enumeration value for the currently executing host machine.
Docs.remarks: On Mac OS X this information is parsed from /System/Library/CoreServices/SystemVersion.plist; on iOS from UIDevice.CurrentDevice.

Docs.param: The platform to check if it's a 64-bit platform.
Docs.summary: Check if the specified platform value is a 64-bit platform.
Docs.returns: Returns true if the specified platform value is a 64-bit platform.
